adHeader: Automotive plastic restoration or plastic coating
adDetails: Hello everyone. I can professionally restore any plastic piece to its original condition and guarantee your satisfaction or its free!!!! I can restore your entire car for $95. Above are some examples of what I do. We come to you. The job takes less than an hour and you can watch us do the work. This is NOT A TEMP Fix. it will last you years no maintenance required other than wash your car.... If you are interested in restoring your plastic or plastic coat a certain object. For more info please email or text me. I WILL NOT answer phone calls. Remember we come and do the job first, if you are unhappy with the result the work is FREE!! you can reach me at show contact info
